name: @prettybad/traits
description: We all have some pretty bad traits

scripts.test: npx rollup -c .rollup.test.js -- test.mjs && node -r source-map-support/register .test.js && rm .test.js
scripts.build: npx rollup -c .rollup.test.js -- index.mjs && mv .test.js out.js && node -i -e "const traits = require('./out')"

author: @fluffywaffles
